Package dal.rootdal

Interface IRootDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
RootDAO
public interface IRootDao
The IRootDao interface defines methods for interacting with root-related data in the data access layer of the Encyclopedia of Arabic Poetry application.

  • Method Details

    • addRoute

      boolean addRoute(String root, int tokenid, int verseId, String status) throws SQLException
      Adds a root route to the database.
      Parameters:
      root - The root word.
      tokenid - The ID of the associated token.
      verseId - The ID of the associated verse.
      status - The status of the root route.
      Returns:
      True if the addition is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • delRoute

      boolean delRoute(String root) throws SQLException
      Deletes a root route from the database.
      Parameters:
      root - The root word to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the deletion is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • updRoute

      boolean updRoute(String root, String newRootWord, String status) throws SQLException
      Updates a root route in the database.
      Parameters:
      root - The root word to be updated.
      newRootWord - The new root word.
      status - The new status of the root route.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • viewAllRouteWithStatus

      List<String[]> viewAllRouteWithStatus() throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • roodIdFromName

      int roodIdFromName(String name)

    • addOrUpdateRoute

      boolean addOrUpdateRoute(String root, int tokenid, int verseId, String status) throws SQLException
      Adds or updates a root route in the database.
      Parameters:
      root - The root word.
      tokenid - The ID of the associated token.
      verseId - The ID of the associated verse.
      status - The status of the root route.
      Returns:
      True if the addition or update is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs.
